nodes.name: _addCoreToRegistry

params._settings: is the Atonomi Network Settings contract address
params._token: is the Atonomi Token contract address (must be ERC20)

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._amount: is the amount of TNT the node has staked
params._nodeIp: is the IPV4 address of the Node
params._nodePublicKey: is the public key of the Node

params._amount: is the amount of TNT the node has staked
params._coreIp: is the IPV4 address of the Node
params._corePublicKey: is the public key of the Node

totalStakedFor(address).details: msg.sender is expected to be the Node Operatorowner has ability to pause this operation

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unStake().details: msg.sender is expected to be the Node Operatortokens that were previously timelocked will be transferred back to the Node Operatorowner has ability to pause this operation

unStake(bool).details: msg.sender is expected to be the Node Operatortokens that were previously timelocked will be transferred back to the Core Operatorowner has ability to pause this operation

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateStake(bytes32,bytes32).details: msg.sender is expected to be the Node Operatortokens will be deducted from the Node Operator and added to the balance of the ChainpointRegistry Addressowner has ability to pause this operation

params._nodeIp: is the new IP address of the staked Chainpoint Node
params._nodePublicKey: the new Public Key of the staked Chainpoint Node

updateStake(bytes32,bytes32,bool).details: msg.sender is expected to be the Node Operatortokens will be deducted from the Node Operator and added to the balance of the ChainpointRegistry Addressowner has ability to pause this operation

params._coreIp: is the new IP address of the staked Core Operator
params._corePublicKey: the new Public Key of the staked Chainpoint Node

methods.constructor: Constructor sets the ERC Token contract and initial values for network fees

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

stake(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).notice: Chainpoint Node staking Allows a Node to stake into the Chainpoint Network

stake(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,bool).notice: Chainpoint Core staking overloaded function definitions Allows a Node to stake into the Chainpoint Network

totalStakedFor(address).notice: Get tokens staked Returns the amount of tokens that a Node Operator has staked and the timestamp as to when the tokens are locked

unStake().notice: Un-Stake a Node, tokens must no longer be timelocked Allows a Node un-stake from the Chainpoint Network given that stakeLockedUntil duration has elapsed

unStake(bool).notice: Un-Stake a Core, tokens must no longer be timelocked Allows a Core to un-stake from the Chainpoint Network given that stakeLockedUntil duration has elapsed

updateStake(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Update Node Information Allows a Node renew their stake into the Chainpoint Network

updateStake(bytes32,bytes32,bool).notice: Update Core Information Allows a Core to update their metadata
